## Correlation
```{r}
Datasnum <- dplyr::select_if(Datas, is.numeric)

correlation <- cor(Datasnum)
correlation
```

```{r}
ggcorrplot(correlation, lab=T)
```
```{r}
ggcorrplot(correlation, lab=T,type = "upper")
```

## Using inspectdf
```{r}
corr_df <- inspect_cor(Datasnum, alpha=0.01)
corr_df
```

```{r}
show_plot(corr_df, alpha=0.01)
```
```{r}
show_plot(corr_df)
```
